citation.abstract: Diabetes Prevention Program (DPP) participants randomized to the intensive lifestyle intervention (ILS) had significantly reduced risk of diabetes compared with placebo participants. We explored the contribution of changes in weight, diet, and physical activity on the risk of developing diabetes among ILS participants.
citation.title: Effect of weight loss with lifestyle intervention on risk of diabetes.

blogs.title: Does Weight Loss Prevent Type 2 Diabetes?
blogs.summary:
Finger-pricking four times a day gets old real quick!
I found an interesting statistic in a scientific journal article last year:
Every 2.2 pound (1 kg) loss of excess weight lowers the risk of developing type 2 diabetes by 16%.
